content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the Cactus Language website and found out that they offer over 20 languages taught in more than 120 locations worldwide, including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, and others. The website also provides links to their social media pages.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.gvenglish.com/", "question": "What English language courses does GV English offer?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: GV English offers General English, English for Academic Purposes, Business English, and English Exam Preparation courses in both Calgary and Victoria, Canada. They also offer Private English Lessons and Pathway programs. Test Centres for the Celpip and IELTS exams are available, along with services such as a Free English Level Check and Visa & Immigration assistance. Accommodations and activities are also provided. \n \n Links: ['ENGLISH PROGRAMS (https://gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses/)', 'English in Canada (https://www.gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses)', 'General English Program (https://www.gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses/general-english/)', 'English for Academic Purposes (https://www.gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses/english-for-academic-purposes/)', 'Business English Program (https://www.gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses/business-english/)']"}]
"""
